data.text:
Friedrich Wilhelm (Friedrich Wilhelm III) "Kurfürst von Brandenburg, König von Preußen" von Preußen formerly Hohenzollern

Born 3 Aug 1770 in Potsdam, Brandenburg, Deutschland

Ancestors

Husband of Louise Auguste Wilhelmine Amelie Mecklenburg-Strelitz — married 24 Dec 1793 [location unknown]

Descendants

Died 7 Jun 1840 at age 69 in Berlin, Deutschland

Profile last modified 17 Apr 2021 | Created 8 Jun 2014

This page has been accessed 4,225 times.

Friedrich Wilhelm III (Hohenzollern) von Preußen is managed by the Germany Project.

Join: Germany Project

Discuss: germany

Biography

Friedrich Wilhelm II. von Preußen King of Prussia

Friedrich Wilhelm IV. von Preußen

Friedrich Wilhelm III (Hohenzollern) von Preußen is a member of the House of Hohenzollern.

Friedrich Wilhelm III., King of Prussia and until 1806 Elector of Brandenburg, was born on August 3, 1770. He was the son of Friedrich Wilhelm II. von Preußen and Friederike Luise von Hessen-Darmstadt. He died on June 7, 1840.

See wikipedia for further information.

On December 24, 1793, Friedrich Wilhelm married Luise Auguste Wilhelmine Amalie von Mecklenburg-Strelitz, daughter of Karl II. zu Mecklenburg and Friederike von Hessen-Darmstadt. They had 10 children:

stillborn daughter

Friedrich Wilhelm IV.

Wilhelm I.

Charlotte

Friederike

Carl

Alexandrine

Ferdinand

Luise

Albrecht

On November 9, 1824, Friedrich Wilhelm married Auguste von Harrach, daughter of Ferdinand Joseph von Harrach zu Rohlau and Christiane von Rayski. They had no children.

Fact: Burial Mausoleum im Schlosspark Charlottenburg, Charlottenburg, Charlottenburg-Wilmersdorf, Berlin, Germany
